trans-unit.source: The SOAP representation of a server error.

When an XML Web service client adds a SOAP header to an XML Web service method call with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A> property set to `true`, the XML Web service method must set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A> property to `true`; otherwise, a SoapHeaderException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: XML 웹 서비스 클라이언트와 XML 웹 서비스 메서드 호출에 SOAP 헤더를 추가 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A>속성이로 설정 `true`, XML 웹 서비스 메서드를 설정 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A>속성을 `true`, 그렇지 않으면는 SoapHeaderException throw 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Detail%2A> property cannot be set according to the SOAP specification for a SoapHeaderException.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Detail%2A>는 SoapHeaderException에 대 한 SOAP 사양에 따라 속성을 설정할 수 없습니다.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Detail%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Applications that use the SOAP 1.1 specification as the service protocol can use the SoapHeaderException to access SOAP faults.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SoapHeaderException 액세스 SOAP 오류에 사용 하 여 수 서비스 프로토콜은 SOAP 1.1 사양을 사용 하는 응용 프로그램입니다.

trans-unit.source: However, applications that use the SOAP 1.2 specification must use the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException> to access SOAP faults.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 SOAP 1.2 사양에 사용 하는 응용 프로그램을 사용 해야는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>액세스 SOAP 오류에.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException"></xref> class with parameters for controlling serialization.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException"> </xref> 클래스 serialization을 제어 하기 위한 매개 변수를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains values that are used during serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> serialization 및 deserialization 중에 사용 되는 값이 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: A SoapHeaderException that contains data about the source and destination of the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: 원본 및 대상의 serialization 스트림에 대 한 데이터가 들어 SoapHeaderException 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException"></xref> class.
A message that identifies the reason the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 발생 한 예외 이유를 식별 하는 메시지입니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Exception.Message*> property.
The type of error that occurred.
This parameter sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code*> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException"></xref> class.
A message that identifies the reason the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 발생 한 예외 이유를 식별 하는 메시지입니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Exception.Message*> property.
The type of error that occurred.
This parameter sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code*> property.
A reference to the root cause of an exception.
trans-unit.target: 예외의 근본 원인에 대 한 참조입니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException"></xref> class.
A message that identifies the reason the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 발생 한 예외 이유를 식별 하는 메시지입니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Exception.Message*> property.
The type of error that occurred.
This parameter sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code*> property.
The piece of code that caused the exception.
Typically, this is a URL to an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 XML 웹 서비스 검색 방법에 대 한 URL입니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Actor*> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException"></xref> class.
A message that identifies the reason the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 발생 한 예외 이유를 식별 하는 메시지입니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Exception.Message*> property.
The type of error that occurred.
This parameter sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code*> property.
The piece of code that caused the exception.
Typically, this is a URL to an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 XML 웹 서비스 검색 방법에 대 한 URL입니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Actor*> property.
A reference to the root cause of an exception.
trans-unit.target: 예외의 근본 원인에 대 한 참조입니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException"></xref> class with the associated data.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException"> </xref> 관련된 데이터를 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: A message that identifies the reason the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 발생 한 예외 이유를 식별 하는 메시지입니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Exception.Message*> property.
The type of error that occurred.
This parameter sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code*> property.
The piece of code that caused the exception.
Typically, this is a URL to an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 XML 웹 서비스 검색 방법에 대 한 URL입니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Actor*> property.
An URI that represents the role of the XML Web service in the processing of the SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 메시지의 처리에 있는 XML 웹 서비스의 역할을 나타내는 URI입니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Role*> property.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode"></xref> that contains the contents of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<subcode>" name="<subcode>" href=""></xref> element of a SOAP fault.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode"> </xref> 의 콘텐츠를 포함 하는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_<subcode>" name="<subcode>" href=""> </xref> SOAP 오류에 대 한 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the root cause of the exception.
trans-unit.target: 예외의 근본 원인에 대 한 참조입니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException"></xref> class with the associated data.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException"> </xref> 관련된 데이터를 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: A message that identifies the reason the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 발생 한 예외 이유를 식별 하는 메시지입니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Exception.Message*> property.
The type of error that occurred.
This parameter sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Code*> property.
The piece of code that caused the exception.
Typically, this is a URL to an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 XML 웹 서비스 검색 방법에 대 한 URL입니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Actor*> property.
An URI that represents the role of the XML Web service in the processing of the SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 메시지의 처리에 있는 XML 웹 서비스의 역할을 나타내는 URI입니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Role*> property.
A string that identifies the human language associated with the exception.
trans-unit.target: 예외와 관련 된 인간 언어를 식별 하는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException.Lang*> property.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode"></xref> that contains the contents of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_subcode" name="subcode" href=""></xref> element of a SOAP fault.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapFaultSubCode"> </xref> 의 콘텐츠를 포함 하는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_subcode" name="subcode" href=""> </xref> SOAP 오류에 대 한 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the root cause of an exception.
trans-unit.target: 예외의 근본 원인에 대 한 참조입니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter sets the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> property.
